channel.title: Vernix-Scape Advertisement! [667] Customs! Upgradeable items! PVP killstreaks!
channel.description:
[667] Vernix-scape has all that you could possibly want! From Custom weapons, to upgrade-able items, it is a great RSPS and i think you should take your time to explore and take a look at it, and if you don't like it fair enough, but i assure you it is great, we have a great owner who is very active and updates are just around the corner. We are currently hosting on a VPS and will be spending $100 on advertisement!
Also this is a list of following things that are inside Vernix-Scape! - Autovote, ::Vote brings up a menu of voting sites, once voted choose your reward! - Donator Tickets, they can get you awesome things! Such as Brutal Whips, Lite wepons, Wings! - Vernix Elite, a very hard boss but can bring you a item such as: Torva (elite) - Pernix (elite) - Virtus (elite)! - Active and helpfull staff! - Active owner! - Great community! - Dicing - Risk fighting - Pking titles! - Killstreaks! And much much more!

We look forward to seeing you there!
Me & the Vernix-Scape community![/B][/CENTER]

@Venix-X wrote:

[667] Vernix-scape has all that you could possibly want! From Custom weapons, to upgrade-able items, it is a great RSPS and i think you should take your time to explore and take a look at it, and if you donâ€™t like it fair enough, but i assure you it is great, we have a great owner who is very active and updates are just around the corner. We are currently hosting on a VPS and will be spending $100 on advertisement!

Also this is a list of following things that are inside Vernix-Scape!
